TopicTitle: Game freezes when loading a specific vessel in the VAB

Articles.Content:
My game freezes up and does that light grey crash filter thingy when I try to load a specific craft. Even when I assemble it again from my subassemblies, it seems to hate this config of craft. Unfortunately I need said craft to advance my progress, it's the workhorse atm. The ksp log says this before it cuts off when windows had to shut ksp down;

[LOG 15:53:28.421] Odin-Arcturus 2 loaded!
[LOG 15:53:30.314] KW2mtankL1B added to ship - part count: 111
[LOG 15:53:30.368] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:53:48.761] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:53:49.771] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:53:50.778] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M

[LOG 15:53:54.824] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:53:55.859] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M

[LOG 15:53:58.901] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:53:59.936] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:54:00.955] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M

[LOG 15:54:04.058] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
[LOG 15:54:05.077] DragCubeSystem: Rendering procedural drag for Heatshield-M
 

any help would be much appreciated!

I imagine the craft file is corrupted. Please link me a download and I'll take a look at it myself. 

EDIT: Please also let me know what part mods the craft uses, as well as any other relevant mods.

Edited March 2, 2021 by Omni122
